#A Short Introduction

= Compiling Ulib =

==Compiling Ulib on Linux OSes==
  # Untar/svn checkout the source.
  # cd ulib_src_dir/
  # make
 
At this time, you will have all necessary headers in ulib_src_dir/include/ and libraries in ulib_src_dir/lib/.

==Compiling Ulib on Windows==
  # We recommend you to use the pre-compiled binaries in the download section for windows. Modifications are needed in order to compile.
